ccp.api.general.Annotation

Classes:

Class Description
Experiment The information on the experiment that has been done.
ExperimentGroup Group of experiments serving a given purpose.
ExperimentStore TopObject for Experiment package
ImportSample This experiment subtype is used for importing samples into the system.
InputSample This is used to imply several input samples in one experiment and also one input sample in several experiments.
OutputSample OutputSamples attach a Sample to an Experiment as the product of that Experiment.
Parameter A run-time parameter (or result) of the parent Experiment.
